review: "Poemas completos de Alberto Caeiro" is a profound and deeply moving collection of poetry that resonated with me on multiple levels. As a fan of poetry and the works of W.H. Auden, I found Caeiro's philosophical and naturalistic approach to be both refreshing and thought-provoking. The poems are rich in imagery and offer a unique perspective on the world, which I found to be both insightful and beautifully crafted. The structure and flow of the poems are impeccable, making it a joy to read from cover to cover. While the pacing and character development are not as relevant in poetry, the depth of the content and the emotional impact of the words make this a standout work. Highly recommended for anyone who appreciates the art of poetry.
